entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN SCATTERED SHOWERS WITH ISOLATED THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH THIS MORNING
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
ISOLATED SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
